modName: Killer Keos Skimpy Armor Sliders for Bodyslide UNP Special
summary: Just a slider conversion with the body references swapped from CBBE to UNP Special.
descriptionHtml:
Just a slider conversion with the body references swapped from CBBE to UNP Special. Easy enough to do but time consuming and there's a lot of people like me who are quite lazy so this should make your lives easier

In short UNP body skin will display correctly for all the included armors and I've included Dawnguard and Dragonborn sliders too.
[b]
* Important note *[/b]

The UNP Unified sliders will cause the bodyshape to clip though the outfit, if you use the traditional bodyslide sliders (E.g. BreastsSH) you can modify the outfits without issue. I may be persuaded to fix those sliders at a later date but to be honest I don't have any current desire to do so.

[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b]
[b]Caliente[/b] - Bodyslide and Outfit Studio
[b]KillerKeos - [/b]Skimpy CBBE V2-V3 Armor Replacer[b]
ChronoTrigger77[/b] - Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT
author: McKMark
